transferAssetToContract(address,uint256,.details: If using the native asset, will automatically wrap

params._specifiedAmount: - The specified amount to transfer. May not be the actual amount transferred (i.e. fee on transfer tokens)
params._wrapper: - The address of the wrapper for the native asset on this domain

returns._0: The assetId of the transferred asset
returns._1: The amount of the asset that was seen by the contract (may not be the specifiedAmount if the token is a fee-on-transfer token)

transferAssetToContract(address,uint256,.notice: Handles transferring funds from msg.sender to the Connext contract.
